verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa-saṅge yuddha kare, skandhe ārohaṇa
tārā dāsya-bhāve kare caraṇa-sevana

synonyms: kṛṣṇa-saṅge—with Kṛṣṇa; yuddha kare—fight; skandhe—on His shoulders; ārohaṇa—getting up; tārā—they; dāsya-bhāve—in the conception of being Lord Kṛṣṇa's servants; kare—do; caraṇa-sevana—worship the lotus feet.
translation: Although they fight with Him and climb upon His shoulders, they worship His lotus feet in a spirit of servitude.
